Method Detail

loadBitmap

loadBitmap

public static Bitmap loadBitmap(Drawable sprite)

loadBitmapResourceSet

public GameResourceSet loadBitmapResourceSet(String setName,
                                             int[] resourceIds,
                                             Bitmap.Config bitmapConfig)
This method will generate a resource set containing Bitmap objects based on the passed resourceIds. The bitmaps will be loaded using the drawables that are referenced by the resource id's and by rendering them onto a canvas using the bitmapConfig that was passed.

Parameters:
setName - The name of the resource set that will be generated
resourceIds - The resource id's for the movie resources
bitmapConfig - The Bitmap.Config object that specifies the rendering method when the bitmap gets generated
Returns:
Returns the generated resource set

loadMovieResourceSet

public GameResourceSet loadMovieResourceSet(String setName,
                                            int[] resourceIds)
This method will load movie resources depending on the passed reourceIds.

Parameters:
setName - The name of the resource set that will be generated
resourceIds - The resource id's for the movie resources
Returns:
Returns the generated resource set

loadRawBytesResourceSet

public GameResourceSet loadRawBytesResourceSet(String setName,
                                               int[] resourceIds)
                                        throws IOException
This method for loading raw resources into a resource set should only be called for loading small files that need to be buffered to optimize performance. It will store the raw resources in byte arrays.

Parameters:
setName - The name of the resource set that will be generated
resourceIds - The resource id's for the raw resources
Returns:
Returns the generated resource set
Throws:
IOException

getResourceSetByName

public GameResourceSet getResourceSetByName(String setName)
This method gets a loaded resource set by it's name.

Parameters:
setName - The name of the resource set that was loaded earlier
Returns:
Returns the resource set if found - else returns null

unloadResourceSet

public boolean unloadResourceSet(GameResourceSet resourceSet)
Unloads a specific resource set. This will outlaw the resources in the resource set for the garbage collector. The resource set must be known or can be obtained using the getResourceByName method.

Parameters:
resourceSet - The resource set that should be unloaded
Returns:
true if the resource set was found and could be unloaded - false otherwise

unloadAllResourceSets

public void unloadAllResourceSets()
This method unloads all resource sets in this GameResources object and outlaws all resources for garbage collecting.
